verbose_text: On the other hand, the MAP kinase pathway begins with phosphorylation of Shc, Grb2 / Sos, and Ras, and results in the activation of extracellular signal regulated kinase (ERK-1 and 2), regulating the mitogenic and pro inflammatory responses of insulin signaling [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Sos, and Ras, and results in the activation of extracellular signal-regulated kinase
